Sure, by all means seed this -- but not right now.  Right now there are thousands of seeds.  It's far more helpful for the bittorrent community to seed it in a few weeks - when the herd has moved on, so to speak and people who didn't get it right away want it.

I try to seed older stuff, things that would otherwise be in danger of not being seeded or have too few seeds.  It's not a lot to add yourself to the thousands, but in a month or two or six - THEN seeding this (or anything else that came out "a while" ago, whatever a while is to you) is really helping people out.

Just something to be considered. :)

Thank you, EZTV, download in less than 6 minutes, great quality as always.  We're all very grateful.
